reasoning.step2:
GrandTotal.Amount — Confidence: 95%
Evidence: "Endbetrag 21.121,95" matches 21,121.95 as in internal notes. Formatting uses comma as decimal separator in source; numeric conversion consistent. Low uncertainty only from possible currency/context but clearly labeled.

Invoice.Date — Confidence: 99%
Evidence: "Belegdatum: 16.01.2024" appears clearly in header. Very low ambiguity.

Sender.VatId — Confidence: 99%
Evidence: "Unsere USt-ID: ATU76204938" appears twice (header and footer). Very explicit.

Vat.Rate — Confidence: 95%
Evidence: Shows "10,00 %" near tax line and "Ausgangssteuer 1 = 10%". Consistent with tax calculation. Low uncertainty from formatting of percent (comma) but converted to numeric 10.

Net.Amount — Confidence: 95%
Evidence: Line shows "19.201,77" as sum and earlier "Summe 19.201,77" which aligns with net amount 19,201.77. Matches VAT calculation (net + vat = grand total). Low uncertainty only from whether that figure is net vs gross, but context indicates net.

Vat.Amount — Confidence: 95%
Evidence: "1.920,18" shown as tax amount ("Ausgangssteuer ... 1.920,18") which equals 10% of 19,201.77 and sums to grand total. Low uncertainty only from OCR formatting but numeric match strong.
